text: Gangadharpur Gram panchayat is the local self-government of the village. The panchayat is divided into wards and each ward is represented by an elected ward member. The ward members are headed by a Sarpanch. Gangadharpur Gram panchayat areas in Chanditala I CD Block in Srirampore subdivision of Hooghly district in the state of West Bengal, India . Map of Gangadharpur gram panchayat File:Map of hooghly district .jpg|Map of Hooghly district showing CD blocks and municipal areas File:CHANDITALA-I CD BLOCK MAP 1.svg|Map of Chanditala-I CD block sowing GP ==Geography== Gangadharpur gram panchayat located at the Chanditala I CD block . Villages and census towns in Gangadharpur gram panchayat are: Bankrishnapur, Gangadharpur(CT) , Malipukur and Manirampur(CT). ==Healthcare== Gangdharpur has a Primary Health Centre with 10 beds. ==References== Category:Gram panchayats in West Bengal
title: Gangadharpur Gram Panchayat
